title: SAMSUNG 244 L Frost Free Double Door 3 Star Refrigerator with Curd Maestro  (Elegant Inox, RT28T3523S8/HL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Unit Refrigerator, User Manual with Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Overview: This refrigerator has a Curd Maestro function that lets you make delicious homemade curd. You can use the key select option to make it thick or soft. Simply choose the serve option when you want to use the curd.

review: Very Very Happy With the service as well as the product Truly as mentioned on the site .Thank You for the exact product as well as Professional and effective customer service
Excellent product...! 👌🤩🙏Very good quality of transportation, packaging, overall etc. I am very happy n satisfied with this product. 👌👌👌🤩🤩🤩

Hi R&D team of Samsung...very vood design and performance fridge however If u read this review my sincere request will be to consider and put one led light in the freezer compartment... Not sure that why wasn't it done during the design of the model. I don't think putting up a led bulb would have inflated the the cost of manufacturing.. Anyways pls check this otherwise very good fridge and extremely satisfied

Great one!
Really happy using it. Keeps food fresh for long (more than expected).
A good investment from my wife to our new married life.

Great product at great price cooling is powerful and design is great features are great its convertible fridge without any noise its must buy product

Curd making in d fridge is just superb.....!

Rest everything is working fine and proper....!
Nice and elegant product, the best part is curd maker feature which made me delighted to buy this fridge. Installation was free and friendly. i recommend to buy it.
